title: New: Blackaby – My Paula
body:
With their debut live show coming up tomorrow (Jan 31) at the Waiting Room supporting Dama Scout, London trio **Blackaby**, led by multi-instrumentalist William Blackaby, have released their first single, the 90’s indebted _My Paula_.

Clocking in at barely over two minutes, it’s a rousing introduction to the group, immediately marking them out as one of the capitals most exciting new bands. Check it out below.

Clocking in at barely over two minutes, it’s a rousing introduction to the group, immediately marking them out as one \[…\]
